about.bruceQuote: "Be water, my friend. Empty your mind. Be formless, shapeless, like water. When you put water into a cup, it becomes the cup. When you put water into a bottle, it becomes the bottle. When you put water into a teapot, it becomes the teapot. Water can flow or it can crash. Be water, my friend." - Bruce Lee ğŸŒŠ

journey.title: About my Chronicles
journey.description: I'm a Frontend developer with 4 years of experience, currently based in SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil. My journey began after graduating in Information Technology Management from FATEC, where I discovered my passion for creating interfaces that impact people's lives. I started developing with Vue.js, moved to React, and various other JavaScript frameworks, and today I'm proud to master multiple modern frameworks that allow me to create robust and scalable solutions.
journey.approach: I approach each project with a meticulous and strategic eye. I'm especially dedicated to creating clean and optimized code, always seeking the best development practices.

funFact.label: Fun fact:
funFact.description: As a results-oriented developer (according to behavioral profile), I'm always studying new technologies. Currently, I'm deepening my knowledge in Node.js, seeking to expand my technical capabilities even further.

journey.conclusion: I believe that a developer's true value lies not just in the code I write, but in the ability to make it elegant and easy to maintain.
